      • enqueue

        public void enqueue(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
           Action action,
           MessageFormatter formatter)
        Enqueues a message transmitted by a player (or environment, in which case player should be NULL), ensuring that there aren't too many messages sent at once.
        Parameters:
        player - - a player (or NULL) that sent this message.
        action - - the action that contains the sent message.
        formatter - - a message formatter that contains all the parameters.

      • getMessageDelay

        public long getMessageDelay()
        Gets the current message delay in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Message delay in milliseconds.

      • setMessageDelay

        public void setMessageDelay(long messageDelay)
        Sets the message delay in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        messageDelay - The new message delay in milliseconds.

      • createView

        public MessagePlayerQueue createView()
        Creates a shallow copy of this queue. Enqueued messages are not copied.
        Returns:
        A copy of the current queue.

      • onTick

        public void onTick()

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes a player's message queue.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player associated with the message queue to remove.
